title: Chief Chemical Engineer / Manager(m/f/d)
description:
Fire Point Rocket Technology (FPRT) is a defense technology company at the intersection of advanced chemistry and modern rocket propulsion. We design and manufacture solid rocket fuel and propulsion components that power next generation defense systems, with a strong focus on safety, quality, and compliance.
FPRT is part of the international Fire Point Group and is the first Ukrainian defense company to open a production facility in the EU. Our new site in Vojens is being built as a state-of-the-art solid-fuel factory, including modern laboratories, production lines and attractive employee facilities (canteen, café, gym, wellness areas and outdoor spaces). Our ambition is significant: we are scaling from the early operational phase to 350+ employees within the next 18 months.
Our mission is clear: we develop technologies that help protect people, freedom and infrastructure. You will join a multicultural, highly skilled team where Purpose, Courage, Mastery and Trust shape how we work together.
